quest.offer_key: A little orphan girl showed up at the tradingpost and won't stop crying about her lost dolly. Find her a doll and you will be rewarded!
quest.description_key: Find a doll and you will be rewarded!!

quest.offer_key: That girl's brother just showed up. All he talks about is becoming a zombie killing soldier and is missing his toy soldier collection. Collect some toy soldiers and you will be rewarded! Are you up for this one too?
quest.description_key: Collect some toy soldiers and you will be rewarded!

quest.name: Nuclear Plant
quest.subtitle: Nuclear Plant
quest.description:
Well....

You seem to be a resourceful fella.
I've heard that there's a active nuclear plant somewhere.

Here, take this modified geiger counter, it might help you.
I adjusted it to look for nuclear plant radiation signature.

I advise you to approach with care.

If you find it, I want you to power it up and make me some plutonium...
Don't ask me how... Just do it, and I'll make it worthwhile

quest.name: Power it UP
quest.subtitle: Power it UP
quest.description: So, let's find that nuclear plant and get ourselfs some plutonium.

quest.name: Power it UP
quest.subtitle: Power it UP
quest.description: Ok, I got the plutonium. Let's get back to madmole and test this thing.

quest.name: Power it UP
quest.subtitle: Power it UP
quest.description: Hmmm! Optimum quality!

quest.name: Power it UP
quest.subtitle: Power it UP
quest.description: Perfect, so you finally got some plutonium... That's awsome man!\n\n Here, take this, make good use of it!

quest.name: Repair My Gun 1/2
quest.subtitle: Get me some stuff
quest.description:
You seem resourceful. If you could get me some leather and
forged iron to repair my Katana, maybe we could talk...

Get this stuff and come back to me!

quest.name: quest_repairKatana2
quest.subtitle: Need some more help
quest.description:
This mats will certainly help me,
but I'm not getting out of here with so many zeds around.

Do some cleaning, and I may follow you!
I really HATE female zombies, their screams are disgusting!

Come back to me when you're done!

quest.name: quest_repairKatana3
quest.subtitle: Get me some more....
quest.description: There are still to many of those suckers running around,\nbring me a few more and I got a nice present for you

quest.name: Military Aid
quest.subtitle: I want revenge!
quest.description:
My entire unit was killed inside the radiated zone!
I want you to kill that damn mutant bosses for me!

I'll make it worth while!

quest.name: Revenge
quest.subtitle: I want revenge!
quest.description:
AH AH AH AH! You got them fuckers!

I hope you brought me their goggles as prove!

Wear them for me, please! This is awsome!!

quest.name: The Farmer
quest.subtitle: Find the Farmer
quest.description: Where the hell is the farmer

quest.name: The Scientists
quest.subtitle: Find the Scientists
quest.description: Scientists, where are they hiding

quest.name: The Katana Lady
quest.subtitle: Find Michone
quest.description: Find Michones House

quest.name: Holy Rooms
quest.subtitle: Find Madmole
quest.description: Find Madmoles Church

quest.name: Get da Beast
quest.subtitle: Find Trooper
quest.description: Find Trooper

quest.name: Is there a Cure?
quest.subtitle: Get your Rad Suit to help us
quest.description:
You know what, take this key and get your Hazmat Suit.

You'll probably need it, if you're gonna help us.

Talk to me when you have it!

quest.name: Is there a Cure? 1
quest.subtitle: Wear the Hazmat
quest.description: Wear the full hazmat suit, and talk with the doc again.

quest.name: Is there a Cure? 2
quest.subtitle: Find the infected Scientist
quest.description:
We've recently sent a team to the outer radiated zones.
We suspected there may be something there that can help us...
Unfortunately we lost contact with our team,
and we fear for the worse.
My brother was one of the team members,
and I was wondering if you could go look for him there.

And... ermmm... If he's infected, please make sure you free him...

Oh and if he's carying any syringe,
make sure you bring it back with you!

quest.name: Is there a Cure? 3
quest.subtitle: One step closer
quest.description:
Well, shit... That's unfortunate about my brother.

However the syringe you brought back
is VERY interesting! This cures almost any disease...
Careful though, it's quite addictive!

Here, you keep that one and let me teach you
how to make more!

Bye now, i'll keep investigating a definite cure!!

quest.name: Save my Ass 1
quest.subtitle: Seed Me
quest.description:
Hi there pilgrim!

I wonder if you could help me with something!
I've been trying to restart my farm, but I need some seeds...

quest.name: Save my Ass 2
quest.subtitle: Save My Ass
quest.description:
Perfect... But this damn zeds keep destroying my plants!

I'm just not strong enough... Could you help me?
You do this for me, and I'll get you a nice ass!

Are you ready for this?

quest.name: Unit Outpost
quest.subtitle: Unit Outpost
quest.description:
I have no hope of surviving... My unit was pinned out deep inside the rad zone..
I managed to run away, but radiation is gettting to me... I feel I can't got on...

At night I hear this damn spiders lurking around, and I'm almost out of ammo..
I made a map of our unit outpost, we left some gear behind! Maybe someone finds this, and is able to use it...
Humanity must survive!
quest.offer:
I have no hope of surviving... My unit was pinned out deep inside the rad zone..
I managed to run away, but radiation is gettting to me... I feel I can't got on...

At night I hear this damn spiders lurking around, and I'm almost out of ammo..
I made a map of our unit outpost, we left some gear behind! Maybe someone finds this, and is able to use it...
Humanity must survive!

quest.name: Mario Diary
quest.subtitle: Mario Diary
quest.description:
I fell my mind decaying... I thought I could come here and salvage some good loot, but this damn radiation is just too much...

I'm starting to forget simple things. This map is a reminder of my hidden stach...

Be careful, i had to run when they came! Those monsters...
I think i lost them, but I can't be sure anymore...
quest.offer:
I fell my mind decaying... I thought I could come here and salvage some good loot, but this damn radiation is just too much...

I'm starting to forget simple things. This map is a reminder of my hidden stach...

Be careful, i had to run when they came! Those monsters...
I think i lost them, but I can't be sure anymore...

quest.name: Military Stach
quest.subtitle: Military Stach
quest.description: Finally a break through! Last night I followed some military crew, and I managed to find out their gear stach!\nI'm making this map for future reference. There was a big gunfight and I still can't believe my eyes.\nWhat I saw was... Unbelievable... Monsters, they were monsters... But i need to get that gear, it's our only ho...
quest.offer: Finally a break through! Last night I followed some military crew, and I managed to find out their gear stach!\nI'm making this map for future reference. There was a big gunfight and I still can't believe my eyes.\nWhat I saw was... Unbelievable... Monsters, they were monsters... But i need to get that gear, it's our only ho...

quest.name: garageburnt1
quest.subtitle: garageburnt1
quest.description: go and find a garageburnt1

quest.name: Master Armorsmith 1/2
quest.subtitle: Master Armorsmith
quest.description:
Hello there.
I am Pacco, and you wont find a better armorsmith anywhere!

Maybe you can make me some errands and who knows...
I may have a nice present for you..

Check your log for more information, please.


NOTE FROM THE TEAM

This quest line was made in loving memory of our good friend René,
aka Pacco.

May he rest in peace

quest.name: Master Armorsmith 2/2
quest.subtitle: Master Armorsmith
quest.description:
Perfect.
As promissed, here's your reward!


NOTE FROM THE TEAM

Pacco was one of the first SDX modders
and the first person to inject weapons
and custom entities in the game.

quest.name: Game Room 1/2
quest.subtitle: My Game Room
quest.description:
Actually, there's something else
that might interest you.

I have a game room downstairs, with some nice prizes
I'm a big collector.
Let me unlock some receipts for you, check your log for the next step.


NOTE FROM THE TEAM

Pacco was the creator of the mod HeadBanger's For Life
and one of the creators of Starvation

quest.name: Game Room 2/3
quest.subtitle: My Game Room
quest.description: I want you to make me a these two toy packages\nand i'll let you get in there.\nCome and see me when you're done.

quest.name: Game Room 3/3
quest.subtitle: My Game Room
quest.description:
Perfect, I see you finally got it.

You can now enter my game room at any time
Good luck!


I hope this helped you to know a little bit
about Pacco.
He was a great modder

And a great man!

quest.name: Merry Christmas
quest.subtitle: Oh Oh Oh
quest.description: Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2018!!

quest.name: Husbandry Basics 1/4
quest.subtitle: Make a whip
quest.description: you could use the whip to tame wild animals
quest.offer: Husbandry - How to tame wild animals

quest.name: Husbandry Basics 2/4
quest.subtitle: Tame a Pig
quest.description: You can capture animals in the wild, by using a taming tool - the whip\nTaming success is based on your husbandry skill.\nIf you fail a taming action, you will hurt the animal. If you fail enough times, you will KILL the animal.

quest.name: Husbandry Basics 3/4
quest.subtitle: The trough
quest.description: Build a corral out of fences or something similar\nand place a trough there for your animal

quest.name: Husbandry Basics 4/4
quest.subtitle: Animal Feed
quest.description:
Find some hay bales and craft an Animal Feed.
Put it in the trough. Now place your animal in the stable

if you put a male and a female there, they will start breeding.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 1/7
quest.subtitle: Wood Bucket
quest.description:
It is time to collect some turd from your animals.
You need a wood bucket to do this.

Craft one.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 2/7
quest.subtitle: Collect Turd
quest.description: Collect turd from your pigs.\nHit the pig holding a wood bucket in your hands.\nBut beware, hitting too much will kill your livestock.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 3/7
quest.subtitle: Tame a Cow
quest.description:
Ok, we know how to tame pigs and collect the turd, which surely useful in some situations...
But there are animals that has far more valuable output...

Lets find a source of the fresh milk. Yes, I definitely mean a cow.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 4/7
quest.subtitle: Milk a cow
quest.description: Now place your cow at the corral and harvest some milk using a bucket wood.\nYou know how to do that, and about the need for being careful of course.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 5/7
quest.subtitle: Tame a Sheep
quest.description: Lets find a sheep and tame it using a whip.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 6/7
quest.subtitle: Shears
quest.description: Sheeps are sooo fluffy...\nWe can use it, lets craft a shears.

quest.name: Husbandry in Action 7/7
quest.subtitle: Wool Collector
quest.description: Lets shear our sheep.\n\nTip: Again, you need to be very carefull, overdoing while harvesting would kill your poor animals.

quest.name: Fishing 1/5
quest.subtitle: Make a hook
quest.description: How to build a hook

quest.name: Fishing 2/5
quest.subtitle: Make a Cane
quest.description: How to build a cane

quest.name: Fishing 3/5
quest.subtitle: The bait for the cane - earthworms
quest.description: Dig the dirt to find earthworms.

quest.name: Fishing 4/5
quest.subtitle: Crafting lures
quest.description: How to craft lures

quest.name: Fishing 5/5
quest.subtitle: Now get some fishes
quest.description:
Equip your cane, and target a natural body of water

Now bait the cane with the R Key, when you get a fish poke the cane will start moving and you'll hear a splash sound.
React quickly by pressing the left mouse button

If you catch something, you then have some seconds to grab the loot by pressing the right mouse button.

quest.name: Nailed Wood
quest.subtitle: Simple, but effective
quest.description: Find some Wood and nails\n\nto craft a nailed wood

quest.name: Chain'N'Locks
quest.subtitle: Chain'N'Locks
quest.description: Find some Wood, forged Iron, and two Locks\n\nto craft a Chain'N'Lock
quest.offer: a Chain, Locks and a piece of wood....sounds interesting

quest.name: Wooden Spear
quest.subtitle: Your first simple Spear
quest.description: Find some Wood.\n\nand craft your Spear

quest.name: Hunting Knife Spear
quest.subtitle: An advanced Spear
quest.description: Find some Yucca Fibers and an Hunting Knife\n\nand 'assemble' it to your wooden Spear

quest.name: Nailed Bat
quest.subtitle: What a Weapon
quest.description: Find a Baseball Bat\n\nand some Nails

quest.name: Spider Infestation 1/3
quest.subtitle: Lord of the Spiders
quest.description: Go out and murder 5 small spiders.\n\nDon't let them bite you...
quest.offer: Just click accept...if you are quick enough.

quest.name: Spider Infestation 2/3
quest.subtitle: King of the Spiders
quest.description:
Time to push them back.
Go out and murder 5 big spiders.

Again, don't let them bite you...
quest.offer: Just click accept...if you are hard enough.

quest.name: Spider Infestation 3/3
quest.subtitle: Emperor of the Spiders
quest.description:
It is time to finish off those mutants.
Go out and raze 3 spider nests. Gather web cobs collected as an evidence.

Be careful, there are many of them...
quest.offer: Just click accept...if you are hard enough.

quest.name: Gone Wild 1/2
quest.subtitle: Show'em who is the boss
quest.description: It is time to show who is at the top of the food chain.\n\nHunt down deadliest predators in the world.

quest.name: Gone Wild 2/2
quest.subtitle: Show'em who is the boss
quest.description: Now you know there are special 'Boss' predators, and you cannot ignore them anymore.\n\nYou need a new carpet anyway.

quest.name: Archery Training 1/5
quest.subtitle: Novice Archer
quest.description: It seems I am doing well with bows and crossbows.\n\nNeed to train more if I want to become a master.

quest.name: Archery Training 2/5
quest.subtitle: Student Archer
quest.description: Need to train even more if I want to achieve something.

quest.name: Archery Training 3/5
quest.subtitle: Veteran Archer
quest.description: Cant stop my hands now. Stretch, release, stretch, release!!

quest.name: Archery Training 4/5
quest.subtitle: Elite Archer
quest.description: Headshots are not enough...

quest.name: Archery Training 5/5
quest.subtitle: Freaking Legolas
quest.description: Need a real challenging task to prove my skills now.
quest.offer: They are strong. But you have a sleeping bag.

quest.name: Blunt Weapons 1/5
quest.subtitle: Footman
quest.description: It seems I am doing well with blunt weapons.\n\nNeed to train more if I want to become a master.

quest.name: Blunt Weapons 2/5
quest.subtitle: Clubswinger
quest.description: Need to train even more if I want to achieve something.

quest.name: Blunt Weapons 3/5
quest.subtitle: Maceman
quest.description: Smash that skulls!!

quest.name: Blunt Weapons 4/5
quest.subtitle: WarHammer Master
quest.description: Its time to make some mashed animals!

quest.name: Blunt Weapons 5/5
quest.subtitle: Thor's Avatar
quest.description: Need a real challenging task to prove my skills now.
quest.offer: They are strong. But you have a sleeping bag.

quest.name: Blade Weapons 1/5
quest.subtitle: Knifeman
quest.description: It seems I am doing well with Blade Weapons.\n\nNeed to train more if I want to become a master.

quest.name: Blade Weapons 2/5
quest.subtitle: Stabber
quest.description: Need to train even more if I want to achieve something.

quest.name: Blade Weapons 3/5
quest.subtitle: Fencer
quest.description: Cut their throats!!

quest.name: Blade Weapons 4/5
quest.subtitle: Sword Master
quest.description: Slice that meat!

quest.name: Blade Weapons 5/5
quest.subtitle: Obi-Wan Kenobi
quest.description: Need a real challenging task to prove my skills now.
quest.offer: They are strong. But you have a sleeping bag.

quest.name: Pistols 1/5
quest.subtitle: Cowboy
quest.description: It seems I am doing well with Pistols.\n\nNeed to train more if I want to become a master.

quest.name: Pistols 2/5
quest.subtitle: Duelist
quest.description: Need to train even more if I want to achieve something.

quest.name: Pistols 3/5
quest.subtitle: Pistolier
quest.description: Do you wanna piece of me boy?!

quest.name: Pistols 4/5
quest.subtitle: Reiter
quest.description: Top 5 holland cheese recipes.

quest.name: Pistols 5/5
quest.subtitle: Django Freeman
quest.description: Need a real challenging task to prove my skills now.
quest.offer: They are strong. But you have a sleeping bag.

quest.name: Shotguns 1/5
quest.subtitle: Farmer
quest.description: It seems I am doing well with Shotguns.\n\nNeed to train more if I want to become a master.

quest.name: Shotguns 2/5
quest.subtitle: Hunter
quest.description: Need to train even more if I want to achieve something.

quest.name: Shotguns 3/5
quest.subtitle: Policeman
quest.description: Freeze, dang it!! You are under arrest!

quest.name: Shotguns 4/5
quest.subtitle: Marine
quest.description: Beasty pump action.

quest.name: Shotguns 5/5
quest.subtitle: Terminator
quest.description: Need a real challenging task to prove my skills now.
quest.offer: They are strong. But you have a sleeping bag.

quest.name: Rifles 1/5
quest.subtitle: Gunner
quest.description: It seems I am doing well with Rifles.\n\nNeed to train more if I want to become a master.

quest.name: Rifles 2/5
quest.subtitle: Rifleman
quest.description: Need to train even more if I want to achieve something.

quest.name: Rifles 3/5
quest.subtitle: Special Forces
quest.description: Freeze, dang it!! You are under arrest!

quest.name: Rifles 4/5
quest.subtitle: Commando
quest.description: Ultimate firepower.

quest.name: Rifles 5/5
quest.subtitle: Deadshot
quest.description: Need a real challenging task to prove my skills now.
quest.offer: They are strong. But you have a sleeping bag.

quest.name: Final Exam
quest.subtitle: Boss of the Bosses
quest.description:
Now you are ready for the final exam.

Here is the list of the strongest abominations, created by the apocalypse itself.

You must stop them, before it is too late...
quest.offer: You can find all of them in the radiated zones.

quest.name: Newbie Farmer 1/6
quest.subtitle: First Tools
quest.description: Collect required materials and craft gardening hoe and the shovel for your farm.

quest.name: Newbie Farmer 2/6
quest.subtitle: Your Bucket
quest.description: Collect required materials and craft iron bucket to water your plants.\nYou need a workbench to craft it.

quest.name: Newbie Farmer 3/6
quest.subtitle: Find a Water
quest.description: Find a source of water and fill the bucket.

quest.name: Newbie Farmer 4/6
quest.subtitle: Find Seeds
quest.description:
Now you need to make your first seeds.

Better to start looking for the Sunflower and Goldenrod plants, as the base materials for the farming expendables.
Make the seeds out of the Goldenrod plant, once you find one.

quest.name: Newbie Farmer 5/6
quest.subtitle: Plant Seeds
quest.description: Find a spot where you want to start your farm, it should be ordinary soil.\nMake a hole nearby using a shovel and fill it with water using your bucket.\nThen you should hoe the dirt near the water source and plant your seeds on the hoed dirt.

quest.name: Newbie Farmer 6/6
quest.subtitle: Time to Harvest
quest.description: Wait until your crops will mature, and harvest them.\nDo not forget to water your plants in time, or better create a water trench, by digging the dirt and filling trench with water.

quest.name: Fertilize It! 1/3
quest.subtitle: A Beaker
quest.description:
We can increase the harvest of our crops.
All we need is a good fertilizer for the soil.

But first, we need to find a beaker to create one.
quest.offer: How To increase the yield of crops.

quest.name: Fertilize It! 2/3
quest.subtitle: Craft Fertilizer
quest.description: Now, when you have a beaker, put it into your campfire and find a resources to make a fertilizer.
quest.offer: How To increase the yield of crops.

quest.name: Fertilize It! 3/3
quest.subtitle: Fertilize It!
quest.description: Ok, it doesn't smell good... But all for the profit.\n\nUpgrade your farmland using a hoe.
quest.offer: How To increase the yield of crops.

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 1/7
quest.subtitle: Natural Pesticides
quest.description: Good farm you have there! ;)\nBut it seems those insects trying to mess with you - almost professional farmer!\n Time to fight back. Craft some Natural Pesticides at the campfire now.

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 2/7
quest.subtitle: Mortar and Pestle
quest.description: Ok, we have a pesticide dust. Now we need a sunflower oil, to mix it with natural pesticides.\nBut first we need to craft a mortar and pestle.

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 3/7
quest.subtitle: Sunflower Oil
quest.description: Now when you have a mortar and pestle, you can make a sunflower oil from seeds.\nJust take 5 seeds in your hand, aim at the mortal and pestle and left-click on it to make an oil.

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 4/7
quest.subtitle: Chemistry Station
quest.description: Hmm... It seems you cannot mix components without a chemistry station.\nYou can craft one after learning the skill and collecting all required components, or... Just find it somewhere, if you are lucky enough ;)

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 5/7
quest.subtitle: Pesticide Spray
quest.description: Ok. So you have access to the chemistry station now.\n\nTime to craft some Pesticide Spray.

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 6/7
quest.subtitle: Spraying Manual Pump
quest.description: You need a tool to spray your pesticides.\nCollect materials and craft it at the workbench.

quest.name: Fight the Plague! 7/7
quest.subtitle: Use it!
quest.description: It is time to release the dogs!\nLoad you spraying pump and use it on your crops.\nIt grants very high resistance to insect plague through the whole lifecycle of the crop.

quest.name: Powered Farm 1/4
quest.subtitle: Diesel Power
quest.description: You can use electric power to help against insects and rodents.\nBetter to create your own generator now.\nDiesel Generator can be created in the Mill, after reading appropriate books.

quest.name: Powered Farm 2/4
quest.subtitle: Insect Repellent Light
quest.description: Craft Insect repellent device.\nIt should be wired to a power source.\nYou can craft it at the workbench.

quest.name: Powered Farm 3/4
quest.subtitle: Ultrasonic Rodent Repeller
quest.description: Craft Ultrasonic Rodent Repeller device.\nIt should be wired to a power souce.\nYou can craft it at the workbench.

quest.name: Powered Farm 4/4
quest.subtitle: Turn it on!
quest.description: It is time to place devices you just crafted.\nEvery device should be wired to a power source and has an area of effect, protecting plants in a decent area.\nMake sure the generator has gas cans inside and powered on.

quest.name: Survivor's Farm 1/6
quest.subtitle: Radio Tower
quest.description: Time to recruit survivors.\nYou can recruit survivors by turning on a radio tower.\nYou need a mill to craft one.

quest.name: Survivor's Farm 3/6
quest.subtitle: Turn it on!
quest.description: It's time to connect your devices and wait for arrival of new survivors.\nMake sure you turned on the generator, it has Gas Cans inside, and Radio Tower lamp is blinking.

quest.name: Survivor's Farm 4/6
quest.subtitle: Farmer Station
quest.description:
While we waiting for survivors, we can prepare a Farmer station.
Collect materials and craft one.
You need to place it near a girl survivor.
You can also tell her to follow you and place the station at desired destination.

quest.name: Survivor's Farm 5/6
quest.subtitle: Farmer Storage
quest.description: Create a storage for your farmer survivor.\nShe will take seeds from this storage, and put harvested plants inside.

quest.name: Survivor's Farm 6/6
quest.subtitle: Farmer Storage
quest.description: As soon as you meet the girl survivor, place a farmer station near her and place farmer storage as close to the farmer station as possible.\nMore info about survivors and farmer can be found in the journal.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 1/10
quest.subtitle: Trap Box
quest.description:
Let's start with catching up smaller animals, like chickens and rabbits.
As they are small and fast, it is better to set a trap and bait it.

Let's craft a trap box first.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 2/10
quest.subtitle: Trap Box
quest.description: Place a trap box and bait it using a wheat.\nThe chance to capture an animal is not so high, but you can place as much trap boxes, as you like.\nJust do not forget to bait'em!

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 3/10
quest.subtitle: Capture Animals
quest.description: Now you have to give it a time.\nDo not forget to check your traps constantly, maybe there is a prey waiting for you already.\nCatch two chickens and two rabbits.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 4/10
quest.subtitle: Chicken Coop
quest.description: Ok now,when you have two of each animals, you need to build them a new home.\nLets start with crafting a Chicken Coop.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 5/10
quest.subtitle: Rabbit Hutch
quest.description: Craft a hutch for your rabbits.\nSome parts can be crafted only at the workbench.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 6/10
quest.subtitle: Find a Water
quest.description: Our animals need a water to drink, as any living creature.\nCraft 2 buckets at the workbench and fill them from any source of water.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 7/10
quest.subtitle: Feed for Chickens
quest.description:
Our animals need a food as well.
Lets make some feed for our chickens first.

Tip: Sunflower Oil made from sunflower seeds using mortar and pestle.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 8/10
quest.subtitle: Feed for Rabbits
quest.description: Now make some feed for our rabbits.\n\nTip: Flour made from the wheat using mortar and pestle.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 9/10
quest.subtitle: Animal Farm
quest.description:
Now you have all required materials to start your own farm.
Place both chicken coop and a rabbit hutch.
Place chickens and rabbits inside accordingly with their food and a bucket of water for each building.
You should check them from time to time to drop new food/water and collect resources they give.
They will also breed, until their number reach 4.
Production speed will increase accordingly, but they will not bring new breed anymore, unless you remove one or two.
quest.offer: Place a chicken coop and a Rabbit hutch.

quest.name: Coops and Hutches 10/10
quest.subtitle: Profit!
quest.description: Time for profit!\n\nCollect resources from your animals.

quest.name: Orchard Basics 1/4
quest.subtitle: Find an Avocado
quest.description:
Now you know how to make seeds and water your plants.
There are a lot of fruit trees in the world. Collect a fruit to make your own orchard.
They say there are a lot of avocado trees at the Pine Forest.
Better start looking there.
You collect fruits using your bare hands.

quest.name: Orchard Basics 2/4
quest.subtitle: Avocado Seed
quest.description: Craft an Avocado tree seed from the fruit now.

quest.name: Orchard Basics 3/4
quest.subtitle: Plant it
quest.description: Plant your seed now, make a water trench nearby, and fill it using a bucket.

quest.name: Orchard Basics 4/4
quest.subtitle: Plant it
quest.description: Now just wait for tree to mature. make sure there is always a water nearby, otherwise you tree will not grow\n.Harvest your fruits barehandly when time comes.
